sense.gloss: chō (unit of land area, approx. 0.99 hectares)
townscape, street (of stores and houses), (look of) stores and houses on street
low-lying part of a city (usu. containing shops, factories, etc.)
Shitamachi (low-lying area of eastern Tokyo near Tokyo Bay, incl. Asakusa, Shitaya, Kanda, Fukugawa, Honjo, Nihonbashi, Kyobashi and surrounds)

sdata.j: ↑奈良↑↓なら↓は↑静↑↓しず↓かで、きれいな↑町↑↓まち↓です。
sdata.e: Nara is a quiet and beautiful city.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑町中↑↓まちなか↓の↑笑↑↓わら↓いものだっていうことを↑知↑↓し↓らないのか。
sdata.e: Don't you know that you are the laughingstock of the whole town?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はすぐにこの↑町↑↓まち↓が↑好↑↓す↓きになるだろう。
sdata.e: You will soon come to like this town.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はすぐこの↑町↑↓まち↓が↑好↑↓す↓きになりますよ。
sdata.e: You will soon come to like this town.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑町↑↓まち↓にいくつ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓がありますか。
sdata.e: How many schools are there in your city?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑市↑↓し↓の↑人口↑↓じんこう↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑町↑↓まち↓の↑人口↑↓じんこう↓の↑約↑↓やく↓５↑倍↑↓ばい↓だ。
sdata.e: The population of your city is about five times as large as that of my town.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓がこの↑町↑↓まち↓にいるなんて↑知↑↓し↓らなかった。
sdata.e: I didn't know that you were in this town.

sdata.j: ↑偶然↑↓ぐうぜん↓にも↑山田↑↓やまだ↓↑先生↑↓せんせい↓は↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑町↑↓まち↓の↑出身↑↓しゅっしん↓だった。
sdata.e: It just so happened that Mr Yamada came from the same town.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はこの↑町↑↓まち↓で↑誰↑↓だれ↓にも↑劣↑↓おと↓らず↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちである。
sdata.e: He is as rich as any man in this town.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はこの↑町↑↓まち↓で↑一番↑↓いちばん↓の↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちである。
sdata.e: He is as rich as any man in this town.
